info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 8:14PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of McDowell, Rutherford, Transylvania, Henderson, Polk, southeastern Haywood, southeastern Buncombe, southwestern Burke, northern Greenville and northwestern Spartanburg Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 813 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Marion to 5 miles northeast of Hendersonville to 9 miles southeast of Waynesville. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hendersonville, Brevard, Marion, Rutherfordton, Columbus, Forest City, Mills River, Spindale, Flat Rock and Etowah. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
